values.value:
You will analyze the sentiment of the provided conversation. Focus only on conversation entries from the customer to predict the sentiment. Disregard service agent entries.
Your answer will be only 1 word, nothing else. No point at the end of the word. Possible values are: Positive, Neutral, Negative
